title: Usability Evaluation and Improvement Project for the Communication Process Reevguide

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in educational resource exploration
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment where pre-service/in-service teachers evaluate and improve the usability of "LiveGuides" (learning guides) for practical classroom application.

learning_goals: Students can analyze differences in navigation menu structures and information accessibility by comparing two versions of LibGuides
Students can propose LibGuide improvement plans based on usability test results
Students can demonstrate understanding of educational material design principles through project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
